title: The fearfull fansies of the Florentine couper: written in Toscane, by Iohn Baptista Gelli, one of the free studie of Florence, and for recreation translated into English by W. Barker. Pensoso d'altrui. Sene & allowed according to the order apointed
author: Gelli, Giovanni Battista, 1498-1563.
publisher: By Henry Bynneman[, dwelling in Knight rider streate, at the signe of the Marmaide],
notes: A translation of: Capricci del bottaio.
Reproduction of the original in the Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
